title: District Panchayat Vadodara Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for 86 Staff Nurse, Pharmacist and Other Posts
description: The District Panchayat Vadodara has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 86 Pharmacist, ANM, Staff Nurse, Nutrition Assistant, Ayurvedic Doctor, and Community Health Officer Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, B. Pharm, D. Pharm, GNM, B.Sc Nursing, BAMS, BHMS, ANM, ITI, 10th, and 12th can apply for the District Panchayat Vadodara Jobs ...
